## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData() method

Create empty ImageData with dimensions copied from provided ImageData.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createImageData(data: IImageData): IImageData;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | <code>IImageData</code> | The reference ImageData to copy the dimensions of. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`IImageData`
